thread.title: LOOK: Ehra Madrigal, BF tie the knot on Boracay
thread.title_full: LOOK: Ehra Madrigal, BF tie the knot on Boracay

title: LOOK: Ehra Madrigal, BF tie the knot on Boracay
text:
LOOK: Ehra Madrigal, BF tie the knot in Boracay INQUIRER.net / 07:23 AM March 04, 2017 A post shared by Tim Yap (@officialtimyap) on Mar 3, 2017 at 3:18am PST ADVERTISEMENT 
Former sexy actress Ehra Madrigal has tied the knot with her fiance. 
She said “I do” to Filipino-Chinese businessman Tom Yeung at the Holy Rosary Church in Boracay on Friday. 
Host-socialite Tim Yap, Karel Marquez and Ehra’s sister Michelle, who were guests at the nuptials, posted photos of the blissful newlyweds on Instagram. A post shared by Michelle Madrigal (@mitch_madrigal) on Mar 3, 2017 at 3:56am PST A post shared by Ria Reyes (@riareyesbpp) on Mar 3, 2017 at 2:10am PST A post shared by Ria Reyes (@riareyesbpp) on Mar 3, 2017 at 6:44am PST A post shared by Tim Yap (@officialtimyap) on Mar 3, 2017 at 12:54am PST A post shared by Karel Santos Fariñas (@iamkarelmarquez) on Mar 3, 2017 at 2:45am PST 
The lovely pair were engaged in Dubai earlier in January and recently had their prenuptial shoot in Venice. 
Madrigal, daughter of former actress Karla Kalua, was a finalist in ABS-CBN’s “Star Circle Quest” before jumping to GMA 7 to star in several prime-time soaps including “Kamandag,”“Lupin” and “Pinulot Ka lang sa Lupa.” 
She was repeatedly praised for her voluptuous body—she was the face of Tanduay calendar in 2008 and a two-time FHM Philippines cover girl. Gianna Francesca Catolico /ra
